Your Bookings When you book, you\'ll see your booking history here
SwipeViewActivity DetailsPageActivity This location is perfect for the downtown visitor. Located walking distance from Grand Central Station, theatre area and MSG. Guillermero was excellent host and the home was excellent and clean. Overall an excellent experience and I would definitely stay here again. I have been a dog lover my whole life. It started with my family getting 4 labs when I was 10. We bred them for a few years, and I loved caring for the puppies and finding them quality homes. Once my husband and I got married we bought our first German Shepherd dog. We named her Princess. We add 3 more German Shepherds to our bunch, Princeton, Payle, and Parlay. They are wonderful, active, smart dogs and we have enjoyed every moment with them. What type of pet do you want to host? What type of space do you want to list? What city is your place located in?
